name: Successor HD Remaster Gold Limited BUG-FREE Edition
name_original: Successor HD Remaster Gold Limited BUG-FREE Edition
description:
本作品由BrotherShort、HUAHUA、skyfalls、Raku和一位不愿意透露姓名的人士开发。

GlobalGameJam2018参赛作品的升级版，又是一部被我翻修翻修发布到itch上的极品游戏。跟上一部不同，这部我实在没法大言不惭地称它为完整的作品，就当是一部习作了。

键位设置：A、D、空格和鼠标

BGM《Battle in the winter》由jobromedia依据“CC BY 3.0”协议发布，本作品的使用未作任何更改

发布地址：https://opengameart.org/content/battle-in-the-winter

授权协议：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Developed by BrotherShort, HUAHUA, skyfalls, Raku and a person who did not want to be named.

The game is the upgraded version of the GlobalGameJam2018 entry which I have refurbished and released on itch. Contrary to the previous one, this one is not a complete work, but a masterpiece.

Control settings: A, D, space and mouse moving

BGM "Battle in the winter" was released by jobromedia under the "CC BY 3.0" agreement, and no changes have been made to the use of this work.

Posting address: https://opengameart.org/content/battle-in-the-winter

License Agreement: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
